article:
In our life, we have rarely expressed our gratitude to those who have lived with us these years. In fact, we do not have to   wait for   a special time to thank the ones   _   to us. If you have   _   anything about giving thanks, it should be this:   _   it now! Saying thanks is such a(n)   _   way to add happiness to the   _  .
Saying thanks not only brightens someone else's world, but also brightens yours. If you are feeling   left out   or unloved, try reaching out to others. It may be just the medicine that you   _  .  www.ks5u.com
Of course, sometimes you cannot express gratitude   _  . In that case, do not fall into   _   -- speak up the first time you have a   _  .
Once a young man, whose name was Mark Brian, was sent to a   _   of India. The villagers, he had been told before, did not have a   _   for "thank you". But on arriving there, Mark Brian found that those villagers expressed their   _   in other ways. Instead of saying thanks, it is their custom to   _   every favor with a favor of their own, and every kindness with the   _   or more kindness. They did express their thanks.
I   _   if we had no words in our   _   for thank you", would we do a better job of communicating our gratitude? And would we be more responsive  , more   _   and more caring?  www.ks5u.com
Thankfulness can be transferred   among people all around us--including ourselves,   _   no one ever misunderstands a thankful heart.
